org.purewidgets.shared.events
Interface InputListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
GuiButton, GuiCheckin, GuiDownload, GuiListBox, GuiTagCloud, GuiTextBox, GuiUpload, GuiWidget
public interface InputListener

Event listener for Input events generated by the org.purewidgets.client.widgetmanager.instantplaces.client.widgetmanager.WidgetManager.

Author:
Jorge C. S. Cardoso
